body.p: To configure the appearance options for the Files Comparison tool, and go to Diff Files Comparison Appearance . This preferences page offers the following options:

dlentry.dd: Wraps the lines presented in the two diff panels at the right margin of each panel, so no horizontal scrollbar is necessary.
Specifies the color used on the vertical bar for incoming changes.
Specifies the color used on the vertical bar for outgoing changes.
Specifies the color used on the vertical bar for conflicts between the compared files.
